headline: Is PulteGroup Still Worth a Look After Recent 12% Pullback in 2025?
summary: If you’ve been watching PulteGroup’s share price lately, you’re likely asking yourself that all-important question: is now the right time to buy, hold, or sell? It’s hard to ignore a homebuilder whose stock, even after some recent bumps, has outperformed the market over the past three and five years. The stock is up 222.4% and 172.9% respectively during those periods. But investors are also seeing a bit of near-term turbulence, with PulteGroup down 11.1% in the past week and 12.1% over the...
